text: taaki ye log (samajhakar) khuda se dare khuda ne ek misaal bayaan kee hai ki ek shakhs (gulaam) hai jisamen kaee jhagadaaloo saajhee hain aur ek zaalim hai ki poora ek shakhs ka hai un donon kee haalat yakasaan ho sakatee hain (haragiz nahin) alhamadolillaah magar unamen aksar itana bhee nahin jaanate
